Event: First artificial  satellite .  First man-made signals from space.
First mammal in  orbit , the dog  Laika .
Confirmed existence of the  Van Allen radiation belt .
First use of  solar power  in space. The oldest artificial object still in space.

First rocket to reach Earth  escape velocity .
 First spacecraft to attempt to impact the Moon's surface.  First artificial object in  heliocentric orbit .  First detection of  solar wind .
First  weather satellite .
First photograph of Earth  from Earth orbit.
First spacecraft to impact another celestial body (the  Moon ). First delivery of national pennants to a celestial body.
First photos of another world from space: the  far side of the Moon .
First solar probe.
First plants and animals to return alive from Earth orbit.
First rocket engine fired in space.
First probe  launched to Mars .

First  hominidae  in space( Ham ).
 First tasks performed in space.
First launch from Earth orbit of  upper stage  into a  heliocentric orbit . First mid-course corrections.  First  spin-stabilisation .
First  human spaceflight  ( Yuri Gagarin ). First human-crewed orbital flight.
First human-piloted space flight ( Alan Shepard ). First human-crewed suborbital flight.
First planetary flyby (within 100,000 km of  Venus  – no data returned).
First crewed space flight lasting over twenty four hours by  Gherman Titov , who is also the first to suffer from  space sickness .
First spacecraft to impact the  far side of the Moon .
First dual crewed spaceflight. First communication between two crewed space vehicles in orbit. First person to float freely in microgravity.
First Mars flyby (11,000 km) but contact was lost.

First planetary flyby with data returned ( Venus ).
 First successful  planetary science  mission.
First woman in space ( Valentina Tereshkova ).
First  reusable crewed spacecraft  ( suborbital ).
First multi-person crew (3) in orbit.
First space walk/ extra-vehicular activity  ( Alexei Leonov ).
First crewed spacecraft to change orbit.
First flyby of  Mars  (returned pictures).
First photographs of another planet from deep space ( Mars ).
First orbital  rendezvous  (parallel flight, no docking).
First  soft landing  on another world (the Moon).  First photos from another world.
First impact into another planet ( Venus ).
First orbital docking between two spacecraft.
First artificial satellite around another world (the  Moon ).
First  soft-landing on the Moon .

First picture of Earth  from another astronomical object (the  Moon ).
 First probe to  map the Moon .
First  polar orbit  around the Moon.
First photos of the  Lunar south pole .
First automated (crewless)  docking .
First liftoff from another celestial body (the  Moon ).

First  animals  and  plants to leave Earth  orbit and travel to and around the Moon.
 First lunar spacecraft  to be recovered successfully.

First human excursion beyond low Earth orbit.
 First in-person observations of Earth from a distance. First  Trans-Earth injection .
First human flight to another celestial body (the  Moon ) and to enter its gravitational influence.

First docking between two crewed spacecraft in Earth orbit.
 First crew exchange in space.
First spacecraft to parachute in Venus's atmosphere, lost contact before landing.

First docking of two crewed spacecraft around another celestial body.
 First lunar mission to include a  lunar landing module .

First human on another  celestial body  (the Moon).
 First words spoken from another world.

First space launch from another celestial body.
 First  sample return  from another celestial body.

First  rendezvous  on the surface of a celestial body.
 First meet up between human explorers and a robotic spacecraft in space (on the  Moon ).
First  automatic sample return  from the Moon.

First  rover  on another celestial body (the Moon).
 First  lunar rover .
First soft landing on another planet ( Venus ).  First signals from another planet.
First  space station .
First  motor vehicle  on another celestial body ( Lunar Roving Vehicle ).
First spacecraft to orbit another planet ( Mars ).
First spacecraft to impact another planet (Mars).
First  soft landing on Mars .  First signals from  Martian surface . First photograph from Martian surface.

First  spacecraft on a trajectory out of the solar system .
 First spacecraft to use all-nuclear electrical power ( SNAP-19   RTGs ).

First spacecraft to enter the  asteroid belt .
 First spacecraft beyond the  orbit of Mars .
First mission sent to study  Mercury .

First flyby of  Jupiter .
 First spacecraft beyond the Inner Solar System.
First spacecraft to return data on a  long-period comet .

First  gravity assist .
 First mission to explore two planets in a single mission (Mercury and  Venus ). First photograph of  Venus  from space.
 First use of  solar wind  for spacecraft orientation.
First flyby of  Mercury .
First spacecraft to flyby the same planet multiple times ( Mercury ).
First multinational crewed mission.
First spacecraft to orbit Venus.
First successful photos from the surface of another planet (Venus).
First real time remotely operated ultraviolet orbital observatory.
First spacecraft to orbit the Sun at  Lagrange 1 .
Jupiter  flyby (closest approach 349,000 km) Encounters with five  Jovian moons . Discovery of volcanism on  Io .

First flyby of  Saturn .
 First photograph of  Titan  from deep space.
Saturn flyby (closest approach 124,000 km), close encounter of  Titan  and encounters with a  dozen other moons .
First reusable crewed orbital spacecraft ( Space Shuttle ).

First  Venus soil samples 
 First sound recording of another world ( Venus ).
First mixed gender crew aboard space station, and first woman,  Svetlana Savitskaya , on space station.
First Infrared  orbital observatory .

First spacecraft beyond the orbit of  Neptune .
 First spacecraft beyond all Solar System planets.
First untethered  spacewalk  ( Bruce McCandless II ).
First spacewalk by a woman ( Svetlana Savitskaya ).
First  balloon  deployed on another planet ( Venus ).
First spacecraft to flyby  Uranus .
First consistently inhabited long-term research  space station .
First close up observations of a comet ( Halley's Comet , 596 kilometers).
First  astrometric  satellite.

First spacecraft to flyby  Neptune .
 First spacecraft to study all four of the solar system's  giant planets  at close range.
First photograph of the whole Solar System  ( Family Portrait ) .
First telescope designed to be repaired in space.
First time a spacecraft coming from deep space uses the Earth for a  gravity-assist  manoeuvre.
First  asteroid  flyby ( 951 Gaspra  closest approach 1,600 km).
First confirmed observation of an  exoplanet .

First  polar orbit  around the  Sun .
 First mission to survey the space environment above and below the poles of the Sun.
Record longest duration spaceflight to date (437.7 day by  Valeri Polyakov ).
First orbit of  Jupiter .
First spacecraft to enter the atmosphere of a  gas giant  ( Jupiter ).
First  laser communication from space .
First orbital radio observatory.
First operational  rover  on another planet ( Mars ).
First spacecraft to use aerobraking to enter orbit ( Martian orbit ).
First multinational  space station . Largest artificial object built in space  to date.
First orbit of an asteroid ( 433 Eros ).
First landing on an asteroid ( 433 Eros ).
First  laser communication in space  between two objects.
First orbit of  Saturn .
First  sample return  beyond lunar orbit ( solar wind ).

First landing in the  outer Solar System  ( Titan ).
 First landing on  a moon  other than Earth's Moon.
First confirmed  cryovolcano  ( Enceladus ).
First spacecraft to impact a comet ( Tempel 1 ).
First asteroid ascent ( 25143 Itokawa ). First interplanetary escape without separating and discarding the  landing gear .
First  sample return  from a comet ( 81P/Wild ).
First confirmed  lakes on the surface of another celestial body  ( lakes of Titan ).
First spacecraft to photograph another spacecraft landing on another celestial body ( Phoenix , on Mars).
First discovery of  lunar water  in the form of ice. [note 3]
First space telescope designated to search for  Earth-like exoplanets .
First images of the structures in the  rings of a planet  ( rings of Saturn ).
First  solar sail .
First  sample return  from an asteroid ( 25143 Itokawa ).
First orbit of  Mercury .
First orbit of an object in the  asteroid belt  ( 4 Vesta ).
First use of a  sky crane  to land on another celestial body ( Mars ).

First spacecraft to leave the  heliosphere .
 First spacecraft in  interstellar space .
First  laser communication  with a lunar satellite.
First spacecraft to orbit a  comet nucleus  ( 67P/Churyumov–Gerasimenko ).
First soft landing on a comet ( 67P/Churyumov–Gerasimenko ).
First flyby and orbit of a  dwarf planet  ( Ceres ). First spacecraft to orbit two separate celestial bodies.

First flyby of an object beyond Neptune ( Pluto  and its moons).
 First flyby in the  Kuiper belt .
 First flyby of a  trans-neptunian object . Last original encounter with one of the nine major planets  recognized before 2006 .
First food  grown in space  eaten ( lettuce ).
First observation of gravitational waves .
First  propulsive landing  of an orbital rocket.
First spacecraft to enter the  atmosphere of Saturn .
First known  interstellar object  detected passing through the Solar System.
First operational  rover  on an asteroid ( 162173 Ryugu ).
First recorded sounds from  Mars .

First flyby of a  classical Kuiper belt object  ( 486958 Arrokoth ).
 First flyby of a  contact binary .
 First spacecraft to make two different flybys in the  Kuiper belt .

First  soft landing  on the  far side of the Moon .
 First  germination of seeds on another celestial body .
First direct photograph of a  black hole  and its vicinity.
First confirmed  quake  on another planet ( marsquake ).
First aerodynamically-powered flight on another celestial body ( Mars ).
First spacecraft to fly through the  atmosphere of a star  (the  Sun's corona ).
Launch of the largest  space telescope  to date.
First landing at the  lunar south pole .
